EditorData.AnimationTags: Make another CINE version of the, GOB_M_Rig_DFLT_CINE_Walk_01, and, GOB_M_Rig_DFLT_CINE_Walk_ToStandL_01, with the torch in the right hand.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: A torch bobs in the darkness, resolving into a goblin. She looks scared.
EditorData.VFXTags: [EG] Shadowcurse fog, Torch fire coming through fog, torch fire loop

Text.Value: Can you feel it? The shadows gnaw at us. Do not take them for granted.
I may or may not be the single greatest True Soul you may or may not have met in your life.
A - a thousand sorrys, True Soul, but I've gotta warn you.
Can you feel that? The dark, it's... hungry. Best watch the shadows.
What about you?
What do you mean 'more or less'?
Phew. This place is dark beyond dark. You feel it too, right? I'm sticking to light wherever I can find it.
We are all everything, and yet nothing, at the same time.
I'll take that as a yes. Listen up.
Uh.

EditorData.NodeContext: Confused, kinda scared - thinks it's a test

Text.Value: I don't have time for this - begone.
I'll keep an eye for other True Souls and then head to camp. Can't get out of here fast enough.
No, I kill them. And you're next.
This is no typical gloom. Need to stay alert.
That's no ordinary darkness. It feels powerful... and familiar. Stay on your guard.
I am death itself, with a tadpole in my skull and sin in my heart.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Cinematic view of the shadowlands, dark and clouded by the shadow curse. The party approaches, stopping just where the shadows grow thickest

Text.Value: I am. Minthara sent me.
There's things in the dark, True Soul. Things that... been touched by the curse. Run and run fast.
Probably. I'm still trying to figure out who I am.
Who wants to know?
This darkness. It hurts. You must feel it too.
Faith keeps my soul true, yes. What of it?
Bless the Absolute. I couldn't take standin' out here much longer.
*This is no ordinary darkness. It feels powerful... and familiar. These lands have been blessed by Lady Shar. You must learn more about her presence here.*
Leave.
Are... are you... the True Soul?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Jogs to position, before addressing player

Text.Value: Don't stick about. A torch will keep you safe - more or less.
Grab a torch, stay outta the dark, and move fast. The shadows have eyes. Go on.

EditorData.stateContext: Goblin holding a torch in her right hand

Synopsis:
Players enter SCL for the first time through the mountain pass. They reflect upon having had a difficult journey. If a second party member is present, they'll point out that you're not alone.The camera then pans to show a group of Absolute cultists nearby, waiting for the drider to guide them.
If Minthara has given you the mission to go to SCL the group will be a mix of half-orcs and goblins and the 2nd character will recognise them as the cultists you were looking for.
If Minthara has NOT given you the mission to go to SCL the group will just be two goblins.
